com.sponsorpay.credentials

Class SPCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.credentials.SPCredentials

  • public class SPCredentials
extends Object

    Object that holds the information about the current user, application and device.

    The application and user id are immutable. You'll need to create a new credentials object to change any of those.

      • getCredentialsToken

        public static String getCredentialsToken(String appId,
                         String userId)
        Convenience method to get a credentials token id for the appId-userId pair. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if AppId is null.
        Parameters:
        appId - the application id
        userId - the user id
        Returns:
        the credentials token
